alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:15PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coffee, Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, northwestern Wayne, Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1115 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Douglas, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Graham, Surrency and Plant Hatch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Wayne
